channel.title: Rebels In The Palace - Rebels Win!
channel.description:
# [color=#FF0000]R[/color][color=#FF4C00]e[/color][color=#FF9900]b[/color][color=#FFE500]e[/color][color=#CBFF00]l[/color][color=#7FFF00]s[/color] [color=#00FF19]I[/color][color=#00FF66]n[/color] [color=#00FEFF]T[/color][color=#00B2FF]h[/color][color=#0065FF]e[/color] [color=#3200FF]P[/color][color=#7F00FF]a[/color][color=#CC00FF]l[/color][color=#FF00E5]a[/color][color=#FF0098]c[/color][color=#FF004C]e[/color]
### <OWO> What's this? This is Rebels In The Palace, a different take on the Assassins In The Palace game mode. Different to AITP, in Rebels there is no Assassin. Instead, the King and his guards become the scum, although there are far fewer guards. The town are the Rebels, who's goal is to have the King executed, while the King and Guards want to equal or outnumber the Rebels to win.
## Rules * Standard forum rules apply. No cheating/discussing the game outside/toxicity. * The game is nightless - Immediately after a lynch, the game will resume. * Voting is the same as usual - when majority is reached on someone, they die. * No-one has a kill, the only way to win is by lynching.
## Role Cards
> ## [color=red]The King[/color] > You are the King! To win you must lynch enough rebels that you and your loyal guards outnumber OR EQUAL them. You lose if you are lynched.
> ## [color=red]Guard[/color] > You are a guard to the Magnificent King [Player]. To win you must lynch enough rebels that you, your fellow guards, and the King outnumber OR EQUAL them. You lose if the King is lynched.
> ## [color=green]Rebel[/color] > You are a rebel. You win when the King is lynched. But who is the King? Happy hunting... You lose if the King and guards outnumber OR EQUAL you.
## Role List **[color=red]The King[/color]** **[color=red]Guard[/color]** **[color=red]Guard[/color]** **[color=green]Rebel[/color]** **[color=green]Rebel[/color]** **[color=green]Rebel[/color]** **[color=green]Rebel[/color]** **[color=green]Rebel[/color]** **[color=green]Rebel[/color]**
## Player List/Graveyard * **Whammerist** * **Memesky - [color=red]Guard[/color]** * **MaximusPrime** * **Firekitten** * **Marluxion** * **Hippolytus** * **CheesyKnives - [color=red]The King[/color]** * **htm - [color=green]Rebel[/color]** * **MtheJoker - [color=green]Rebel[/color]** ### Spectators: * **Shurian** * **Pug**
